messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
An ace has the knowledge and
experience of battling at high levels.I’ll demonstrate what that means to
a noob like you!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Wow...
I’m in the mood to sing a lullaby...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Your earnest enthusiasm...
I guess that kinda makes you an ace.Maybe you’re a Trainer who has the
potential to surpass aces!
